question: Which of the following is correct increasing order of pH values of the following substances?
option1: Gastric Juice < Milk Of Magnesia < Citric Juice < Pure Water
option2: Gastric Juice < Citric Juice < Pure Water < Milk Of Magnesia
option3: Citric Juice < Gastric Juice < Pure Water < Milk Of Magnesia
option4: Gastric Juice < Citric Juice < Milk Of Magnesia < Pure Water
answer: Gastric Juice < Citric Juice < Pure Water < Milk Of Magnesia
